Title: Establishes a home repair project revolving loan program and revolving loan fund; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a home repair project revolving loan program and revolving loan fund for emergent or essential home repair projects for low and middle-income households.
LawCode: Add ยง59-j, Priv Hous Fin L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing a home repair project revolving loan program and revolving loan fund; and making an appropriation therefor
